name: The_Vending_Machine
description:
There are 2 endings. Every character has a set of possible items to give the player  (except for the vending machine).

If you have some feedback for me that would be great this is my first game.

!! spoiler ahead!!

Bug reports: I saw that animations with the head can get stuck, Just repeat the interaction.

It can take a long time for the game to give an ending. Try doing things that show progression (piles getting bigger).
